item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, February 17, 2025 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. End of an era? Germany in disarray as US scolds staunchest European ally
2. Europe scrambles to respond as US and Russia prepare for Ukraine peace talks
3. Ukraine rejects Trump bid to take rights to half its mineral reserves
4. UBS offers sabbatical perk to former Credit Suisse staff only
5. Starmer offers to put British ‘boots on the ground’ in Ukraine
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, February 17, 2025 at 8:20 AM UTC
